meanings.definition: The thick coat of soft hair covering the skin of a mammal, especially when fine, soft, and thick.
meanings.sent1: The bear's furs kept it warm in the cold forest.
meanings.sent2: She wore a luxurious coat made of furs to the winter ball.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel joked that its furs were so fluffy, they could double as a pillow.
meanings.sent4: The furs of the rabbit were as white as freshly fallen snow.
meanings.sent5: The furs of the fox shimmered in the sunlight, a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The hair-covered, dressed pelt of a mammal, used in making garments or as a trimming or decoration.
meanings.sent1: The fashion designer used furs to create a stunning winter collection.
meanings.sent2: The vintage coat was adorned with luxurious furs along the collar.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the furs on the jacket were real and tried to play with them.
meanings.sent4: The furs on the throw blanket added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent5: She admired the intricate patterns on the furs of the coat, marveling at the craftsmanship.
